insert_row.name: insert_row
insert_row.description: Append a row of values to an existing sheet

include_team_drives.description: Determines if sheets from Team Drives should be included in the results.

as_string.description: Inserted values that are dates and formulas will be entered strings and have no effect

first_row_headers.description: If the first row is headers

delete_row.name: delete_row
delete_row.description: Delete a row on an existing sheet you have access to

include_team_drives.description: Determines if sheets from Team Drives should be included in the results.

update_row.name: update_row
update_row.description: Overwrite values in an existing row

include_team_drives.description: Determines if sheets from Team Drives should be included in the results.

first_row_headers.description: If the first row is headers

find_rows.name: find_rows
find_rows.description: Find rows in a Google Sheet by column name and search value

include_team_drives.description: Determines if sheets from Team Drives should be included in the results.

columnName.displayName: The name of the column to search in

matchCase.description: Whether to choose the rows with exact match or choose the rows that contain the search value

startingRow.description: The row number to start searching from

numberOfRows.description: The number of rows to search ( the default is 1 if not specified )

clear_sheet.name: clear_sheet
clear_sheet.description: Clears all rows on an existing sheet

include_team_drives.description: Determines if sheets from Team Drives should be included in the results.

is_first_row_headers.description: If the first row is headers

find_row_by_num.name: find_row_by_num
find_row_by_num.description: Get a row in a Google Sheet by row number

include_team_drives.description: Determines if sheets from Team Drives should be included in the results.

rowNumber.description: The row number to get from the sheet

get_next_rows.name: get_next_rows
get_next_rows.description: Get next group of rows from a Google Sheet

include_team_drives.description: Determines if sheets from Team Drives should be included in the results.

memKey.description: The key used to store the current row number in memory

groupSize.description: The number of rows to get

new_row.name: new_row
new_row.description: Trigger when a new row is added, and it can include existing rows as well.

include_team_drives.description: Determines if sheets from Team Drives should be included in the results.

max_rows_to_poll.description: The maximum number of rows to poll, the rest will be polled on the next run, maximum is 10 in order to avoid errors.
